issue.title: request save crashes if pricing disabled
issue.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

If pricing is disabled in shop parameter, if you try to upload a result, there is an error : 

Fatal error: Cannot access empty property in /components/com_easysdi_shop/models/request.php on line 263

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2

comments.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Hi Thomas !

I'm working on this ! Will be commited very soon !
